overview:
David Tanzer is the Principal Database Architect at MyWebGrocer. David has been developing large scale database systems for 26 years, and has been working with SQL databases since 1988. He has experience in the design, development, management, monitoring and optimization of database applications. David has been the DBA at MyWebGrocer for six years and has an intimate knowledge of the technical data base issues facing the grocery industry.

via: MyWebGrocer
